thread.title: More trouble for Wells Fargo as bank earnings disappoint

title: More trouble for Wells Fargo as bank earnings disappoint
text:
More trouble for Wells Fargo as bank earnings disappoint 4:33pm EDT - 01:41 
Bank shares tumbled and led Wall Street lower Friday as investors found something to groan about in first-quarter results from JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Wells Fargo. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
